text: TR Warszawa TR Warszawa website (also Teatr Rozmaitości w Warszawie, i.e., Variety Theatre in Warsaw) is a theatre in Warsaw, Poland, by Marszałkowska Str., 8.Teatr Rozmaitosci w Warszawie / The Variety Theatre in Warsaw ==History== Its history began in 1945, when a stage of the Municipal Dramatic Theatres (Miejskie Teatry Dramatyczne) was opened in the basement by Marszałkowska 8. The theatre has existed as an independent entity since 1972. The theatre has operated under various names: Teatr Rozmaitości (1948–1949), later Teatr Dzieci Warszawy (Theatre of the Children of Warsaw) then Teatr Mlodej Warszawy (Theatre of Young Warsaw) and again as Teatr Rozmaitości. ==References== Category:Theatres in Warsaw Category:1945 establishments in Poland Category:Theatres completed in 1945
title: TR Warszawa
